cvrfdoc.DocumentTitle: Red Hat Security Advisory: squid:4 security update

DocumentNotes.Note:
An update for the squid:4 module is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.1 Extended Update Support and Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.2 Extended Update Support.
Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Important. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.

Squid is a high-performance proxy caching server for web clients, supporting FTP, Gopher, and HTTP data objects.
Security Fix(es):
* squid: improper input validation may allow a trusted client to perform HTTP request smuggling (CVE-2020-25097)
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
